alert.note: Alert for Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 8:05PM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Little if any additional snow accumulation, but patchy freezing drizzle is likely. * WHERE...Cambria County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads will remain slippery.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel as significant winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
